title: [K-12] Workshop on Designing Adaptive Online Strategies for Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Learning Theories and Experience with Online Educational Tools
context.additional_context: Exploration of personalized learning design methods feasible in smartphone-based low-tech environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language education scenarios by applying adaptive learning principles.
Learners can accurately propose personalized content pathways with over 80% accuracy through learner profile analysis.
Learners can create an assessment rubric composed solely of smartphone-based tools with 90% completeness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
